Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored a career-high tying 50 points with 10 3-pointers to help the Pelicans snap an 11-game losing streak
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in New Orleans for the first time since a deadly New Yearâ€™s Day attack in the French Quarter, and a moment of silence was held before tipoff
Others: Jordan Poole scored 24 points for the Wizards but was affected by a hard fall under the basket with 4:38 left in the third quarter. He scored just five more points after the fall, which sent him to the locker room briefly for treatment for lower back soreness. Rookie center Yves Missi had 12 point and 11 rebounds for New Orleans.
